sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import femaleProfile from "../femaleProfile.jpg" import maleProfile from "../maleProfile.jpg" const Employees = () => { const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ fetch('http://localhost:5000/tasks') then(req => req.json()) then(data => setEmployees(data)) },[]) const [team, setTeam] = useState('TeamB') const selValCh = (e) => { setTeam(e.target.value) } const hangleChangingTeam = (id) => { employees, setEmployees setEmployees(employees.map(all => all.id == id ? {...all, teamName: team} : all )) } return (
{employees.map(person => (
hangleChangingTeam(person.id)}>

{person.fullName}

{person.designation}

))}
) } export default Employees
